channel.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [ERI1C][Hosted Private Cloud] - Migration Zpool
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 7, 07:00 UTC  -  Jul 11, 16:00 UTC

Apr 10, 21:51 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

Start time : 07/07/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 11/07/2025 16:00 UTC
Service impact : You may experience a micro cut if the customer is writing a lot on the zpool.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, our teams will perform filer transfers.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [EU/CA][Hosted Private Cloud] - Host replacement maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT May 26, 07:00 UTC  -  May 29, 16:00 UTC

Apr 29, 20:43 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

This may temporarily affect the availability of vMotion.

Start time : 26/05/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 30/05/2025 16:00 UTC
Service impact : Concerned hosts will be put in maintenance mode during the operation and a vMotion will be performed if it has Virtual machines in it.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our Hosted Private Cloud offer, we will be replacing Hosted Private Cloud's hosts by new ones.
Concerned customers will receive a notification regarding the replacement of their hosts.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [EU/CA][Hosted Private Cloud] - vSphere maintenance notification
item.description:
May 2, 13:34 UTC
Completed - The maintenance it has been postponed and will be rescheduled.
A new post will be created when the new schedule has been validated.

Apr 25, 08:19 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.
This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 05/05/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 07/05/2025 15:00 UTC
Service impact : vSphere not accesible for 1h and hosts will be put in maintenance mode during the maintenance and a vMotion will be performed if it has Virtual machines in it.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for vSphere offer.
An individual communication will be done to inform customers and you can reschedule through the manager.

Thank you for your understanding

item.title: [RBX8][VMware Private Cloud] - Rack R806R17 incident notification
item.description:
Apr 30, 22:02 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that the incident on our VMware Private Cloud offer on the specific rack R806R17, have been resolved
Start Time : 30/04/2025 18:08 UTC
End Time : 30/04/2025 21:30UTC
Root cause : This incident is caused by a malfunction on some hardwares.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident

Apr 30, 19:17 UTC
Identified - We have determined the origin of the incident affecting our VMware Private Cloud offer on the specific rack R806R17 .

Here are some supplementary details :
Start time : 30/04/2025 18:08 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Some hosts located in RBX8 are temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Some customers are temporarily unable to access and use their VMs located in rack R806R17 .
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a malfunction on some hardwares.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilized to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Apr 30, 19:14 UTC
Investigating - We are currently experiencing an event affecting our VMware Private Cloud offer on the specific rack R806R17 .
Start time : 30/04/2025 18:08 UTC

Our teams are fully committed to investigating this issue and working towards a resolution as soon as possible. As investigations are ongoing, we will share any new findings or updates with you as soon as possible.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
